Articles.Content:
Ok, this happened twice now, so I'm reporting it.

1. I was flying a Laythe UAV quickly there but when I went out of timewarp and right into camera view, the wings made a puff noise and on one of them the tail just fell right off.

2. I had just finished putting a probe in Munar orbit and I returned to the Space Shuttle in LKO that I had launched it from, and I heard the familiar 'puff' noise and literally a bit of smoke came up, then all the wings, and the elevons attatched to them, fell right off and went floating into space.

This is not acceptable and I would like to know why wings just go 'poof' in orbit. The log says they 'collided with launch pad' but it's in LKO..
This is a well known bug that no one knows the cause of and i don't know if there is a fix. Sorry.

This is a well known bug that no one knows the cause of and i don't know if there is a fix. Sorry.

I'm so glad it's not just me lol. XD
It happens. Next time, hit F3 after the wings come off. The mission report will probably say that they "collided with the VAB".

Yep, sympathies and shrugs.

Getting it while in another SOI is a new record though, I think - congratulations, for what it's worth :-(
